input.sentences: the women 's basketball team were competing for the national championship .
just right before the game | the men received their trophies .
this gave motivation for the women to compete harder than they ever did during the season .
they eventually lost the game to the other team .
fans who believed in them right from the start were devastated .
output.sentences: The girl stole the ball from the other team.
The mascot took pictures with fans on the sideline.
She went in for a layup to score a point,
The other team blocked the shot.
Fans were upset at the outcome of the game.
